attributes.action: create a multi level tax for people who use a vehicle to drop children at school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A taxation should be created in order to reduce the number of school runs using vehicles.  A multiple level tax should be put in place to recognise that different situations should be charged accordingly.  For example dropping kids off before going onto employment would be taxed less than a non employed person or stay at home parent.  Reductions could be made if regular multiple occupancy of other peoples children and no tax for distances greater than x miles from the school.
